document_data.caption: A map showing the Temple of Isis (labeled #29) in the corner of Skuld's Central Ward.
document_data.name: Temple of Thoth
document_data.mainbody: The '''Temple of Thoth''' was a temple dedicated to the worship of [[Thoth]], the scribe of the [[Mulhorandi pantheon]].{{Cite interactive atlas|490 Skuld}}
document_data.Location: The temple was located in the the northeast section of Skuld's [[Skuld/Central Ward|Central Ward]] in the center of the city.
document_data.Description: Thoth's temple was easily the largest structure in the Central Ward.
